Name: Cunningham's Commandos
Details: Cunningham's Commandos was created after the Fourth Succession War by Danny Cunningham, a mercenary captain from another defunct unit who recruited his own cadre from among mercenaries and AFFS veterans.  Cunningham's Commandos have spent the majority of their existence serving the Federated Commonwealth.  They are noted as the primary Opposition Force for the Novaya Zemlya Combat Training Center, mimicking Capellan and later Clan tactics.  The unit consists of two Battlemech regiments.
